title: Unexpected behavior of net library.
body:
go version go1.6.2 darwin/amd64

I just write two programs. First - tcp-server. Second - tcp-client. And i tried to count, how many qps can handle my tcp server.

My server
https://gist.github.com/AlexandrButenko/410a7380ab2ab8c23b8cce92edc1b182
My client
https://gist.github.com/AlexandrButenko/997b697fe345dad4d46f3b4b68d8a7db


Actually, i expect to see numbers of requests, which one can be handled by my server. I see it for a while, and then server just stop handle requests (just write 0 in console).

May be i just do something wrong?

P.S. Sorry for my english... I hope somebody can answer.
